abstract: In addition to a $3.2 million payment to the family of Milly Dowler, Mr. Murdoch will personally donate $1.6 million to charities selected by the family.
snippet: In addition to a $3.2 million payment to the family of Milly Dowler, Mr. Murdoch will personally donate $1.6 million to charities selected by the family.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

lead_paragraph: Hours before Rupert Murdoch, chairman and chief executive of News Corporation, faces shareholders at the company's annual meeting, the company announced Friday that it would pay $3.2 million to the family of Milly Dowler, the murdered British teenager whose phone was hacked by News Corporation's News of the World tabloid.

headline.main: News Corp. to Pay $3.2 Million to Murdered Girl's Family
